subtitle: Instructions:
steps: Adjust the height of the seat so that the handlebars align with the center of your chest
Sit down with your back against the chair
Grab the handlebars
Retract shoulders for maximum chest engagement
PUSH!

subtitle: Instructions:
steps: Adjust the height of the seat so that the strap aligns with your hip
Stand on the platform and lay back against the chair
Wrap the strap snugly around your hip
Grab the handlebars
THRUST!

subtitle: Instructions:
steps: Place feet shoulder-width apart in the middle of the pedestal
Place back and shoulders securely against padding
Ensure back is straight throughout the movement
Push with legs up!
Release the locking mechanism by pulling the handlebar
When finished, stand straight and reset the locking mechanism

subtitle: Instructions:
steps: Adjust the height of the seat so that you can touch the bar with the tip of your finger
Adjust the height of the thigh stop so that it prevents you from moving up
Partially Stand back up and grab the bar
Pull the bar down while sitting down
Pretend to bend the bar inwards while pulling down, leaning back a little
PULL!

subtitle: Instructions:
steps: Sit down with your legs bent slightly 30 degrees
Lean forward to grab the handles
Lean back until back is straight
Retract shoulders to prioritize lats
PULL!

subtitle: Instructions:
steps: Adjust the height of the seat so that your elbows are lined up with the rotating joint
Place chest against padding
Grab the handlebars
Extend arms straight!
